Sentece: Methantheline reached maximum plasma concentrations of approximately 25 ng/ml after 2.5-3 h and was eliminated at an apparent half-life of approximately 2 h.
Title: Relative bioavailability and pharmacodynamic effects of methantheline compared with atropine in healthy subjects.
